item.title: Oracle免安装客户端
item.description: 从已经安装过oracle的server或client 拷贝如下文件 classes12.jar oci.dll ocijdbc10.dll ociw32.dll ojdbc14.jar orannzsbb10.dll oraocci10.dll oraociei10.dll sqlnet.ora tnsnames.ora 配置环境变量 Path = D:\oraclient; TNS_ADMIN = D:\oraclient; NLS_LANG = SIMPLIFIED CHINESE_CHINA.ZHS16GBK 提供个下载连接10.2.
